data: She was certainly very pretty, and just then she looked prettier than usual, for the sharp run had brought a more vivid colour to the cheek, and an added sparkle to the eye.
When the Birds Begin to Sing
Graham, Winifred (Matilda Winifred Muriel); Piffard, Harold, 1867-1938 [Illustrator]
